results.title: Effect of simvastatin on ischemic signs and symptoms in the Scandinavian simvastatin survival study (4S).
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ participating in the Scandinavian @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Survival Study, @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ lowering with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced the incidence of @DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@carotid bruits@@@ and cerebrovascular events as well as new-onset or worsening of @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina pectoris@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@intermittent claudication@@@.

citations.NLM: Pedersen TR, Kjekshus J, Pyörälä K, Olsson AG, Cook TJ, Musliner TA, Tobert JA, Haghfelt T. Effect of simvastatin on ischemic signs and symptoms in the Scandinavian simvastatin survival study (4S). Am J Cardiol. 1998 Feb 1;81(3):333-5. PMID: 9468077

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on walking performance and symptoms of intermittent claudication in hypercholesterolemic patients with peripheral vascular disease.
results.text_hl: There was also a greater improvement in @<m>DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@claudication@@@ symptoms among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Mondillo S, Ballo P, Barbati R, Guerrini F, Ammaturo T, Agricola E, Pastore M, Borrello F, Belcastro M, Picchi A, Nami R. Effects of simvastatin on walking performance and symptoms of intermittent claudication in hypercholesterolemic patients with peripheral vascular disease. Am J Med. 2003 Apr 1;114(5):359-64. results.title: Effect of simvastatin versus placebo on treadmill exercise time until the onset of intermittent claudication in older patients with peripheral arterial disease at six months and at one year after treatment.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ versus placebo on treadmill exercise time until the onset of @<m>DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@intermittent claudication@@@ in older @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Peripheral_Arterial_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D058729 @@@peripheral arterial disease@@@ at six months and at one year after treatment.

results.title: Effect of Simvastatin Treatment on "In Vitro" NLRP1 Inflammasome Expression in Peripheral Arterial Disease.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, HAECs exposed to the plasma of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Chronic_Limb_Threatening_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D000089802 @@@critical limb ischemia@@@ and treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ responded with a higher @GENE_NLRP1 @GENE_22861 @@@NLRP1@@@ expression than those exposed to the plasma of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@claudication@@@ (RQ 1.1 +- 0.3 vs. 0.99 +- 0.14, P < 0.001).

citations.NLM: Bleda S, de Haro J, Lopez de Maturana I, Varela C, Ferruelo A, Acin F. Effect of Simvastatin Treatment on "In Vitro" NLRP1 Inflammasome Expression in Peripheral Arterial Disease. Ann Vasc Surg. 2016 Oct;36():260-264. PMID: 27423725
